data.name: Mirror 2: Project X - Ringtone
data.detailed_description:
This is a free DLC that contains quality ringtones from BGMs in Mirror 2: Project X and DLC songs.

Instructions:
After purchasing, you can find it in the install folder of Mirror 2: Project X.
data.about_the_game:
This is a free DLC that contains quality ringtones from BGMs in Mirror 2: Project X and DLC songs.

Instructions:

data.short_description: This is a free DLC that contains quality ringtones from BGMs in Mirror 2: Project X and DLC songs. Instructions: After purchasing, you can find it in the install folder of Mirror 2: Project X.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
